content: Yeah, that makes sense. I'll definitely try to keep it short and sweet, and add context to make it more engaging. I think I'll also ask my audience for feedback or suggestions on the recipe to encourage more interactions. Thanks for the tips! By the way, do you think I should share some user-generated content on my Instagram Stories as well? I've been seeing some great pasta recipes from my followers, and I think it would be awesome to feature them.
